csw.services.loc

Interface LocationTrackerClientActor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLocationTrackerClientActor

    public interface LocationTrackerClientActor
    Can be used by an actor to keep track of component connections.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      void allResolved(scala.collection.immutable.Set<LocationService.Location> locations)
      Called when all locations are resolved

      Returns a set of ActorRefs for the components that are resolved and match the config's prefix
      scala.Option<LocationService.Location> getLocation(Connection connection)
      Returns the location for the given connection, if known
      scala.collection.immutable.Set<LocationService.Location> getLocations()
      Returns the set of known locations

      Starts tracking the location for the given connection
